name: Race Against Space
description:
In Race Against Space, players jump and punch their way to being the last man standing while a black hole begins consuming everything that's sucked into it. Play with up to three of your friends and see who can be the last man standing.

Race Against Space is set amidst a faction space war when a black hole appears and tears apart the four factions forcing them all to retreat.  

* Controllers Required*

*Requires 2 players to play*

An Aquam Aridam Game
